resources.string: We need to know where to look for events around you...
We need to know where to look for events around you...
We need to know where to look for events around you.

"This is where a user can add his/her own event.
"
"Maybe a user is throwing a party that's open to similar people.

" "Fill Out Data Fields: 
" "	 Location (current location?).
" "	 Event name.
" "	 Type of event.

" "Options: 
" "	 Invite friends to party.
" "	 Invite friends to party.
"
